name: H. Sofia Pinto
content: Helena Sofia Pinto Home Page Welcome to Sofia Pinto's home page My full name is Helena Sofia Andrade Nunes Pereira Pinto, although I usually just use Helena Sofia Pinto. I am an Assistant Professor in the Technical University of Lisbon, Instituto Superior Tecnico IST, Dept. of Computer Science and Informatics. I am also a researcher in the DMIR group of INESC-ID. For some info about my research work since 2003 . For some further info about my work in the Department . From November 2005 till February 2006 and November 2003 till February 2004 I was at AIFB . From November 2005 till February 2006 I was at ISWeb . For some info about my prior work at GIA (1985-2003). I was also a researcher in the ALGOS group of INESC-ID. DBLP Refs to my work according to google scholar Refs to my work according to citeseer Countries I've visited (in red): 45 countries (20%) create your own visited country map create your own visited country map
